title: Escape the Enchanted Forest
goal: Find the Forest Guardian’s Amulet and open the magical portal home

rooms.name: Woodland Clearing
rooms.description: A circular clearing glowing with magical light. Mushrooms shimmer, and ancient carvings decorate a stone pedestal.

items.name: stone pedestal
items.description: A pedestal with faint carvings depicting Sun, Moon, and Star: 1, 2, and 3.

items.name: wooden box
items.description: A box with a leaf-shaped lock.

items.name: hollow tree trunk
items.description: A tree trunk with two compartments.

subcontainers.name: rune compartment
subcontainers.description: A compartment with a combination lock featuring symbols from left to right: moon, star, sun.

items.name: riddle note
items.description: A note about a riddle-speaking owl.
items.text: The key of leaves is held by the creature of riddles. Seek the owl whose eyes see truth.

items.name: Forest Charm
items.description: A glowing charm infused with forest magic.

items.name: Leaf Key
items.description: A key shaped like a leaf, made of green crystal.

items.name: path east
items.description: A path leading deeper into the forest.

rooms.name: Ancient Grove
rooms.description: A mystical grove dominated by a massive stone owl statue with glowing eyes.

items.name: stone owl statue
items.description: A wise owl that asks three questions.

password_questions.question: What rises in the morning sky?

rooms.name: Portal Glade
rooms.description: A magical glade containing a dormant portal.

items.name: amulet pedestal
items.description: A pedestal with an amulet on it.

items.name: Forest Guardian’s Amulet
items.description: A powerful amulet granted by the Owl Guardian.

items.name: magical portal
items.description: A portal that activates with combined forest magic.

rooms.name: Home Gateway
rooms.description: A shimmering portal that leads back to your home, glowing with familiar magic.
rooms.win_message: You have restored the forest’s magic and found your way home. You win!
